summary: Results-oriented sales and business development leader with a technical background. Proven ability to drive revenue growth, build strategic partnerships, and develop go-to-market strategies across SAP environments. Strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills with proficiency in SAP CRM and MS Office.

experience.title: Business Development Specialist
experience.description: Developed new business opportunities across the SAP Northeast Large Enterprise territory; consistently exceeded Market Generated Opportunity and Revenue quotas. Strategically collaborated with assigned field representatives to develop and deploy go-to-market strategies to acquire new business for SAP. Implemented outbound marketing campaigns and maintained accurate and up-to-date CRM information on all accounts. Recommended and introduced key solutions to C-Level Executives within the territory. Leveraged solution specialists and engineers to qualify and develop opportunities, and utilized SPIN Selling and BANT to advance deals. Collaborated with inside sales to develop territory strategies.

experience.title: Sales Optimization Specialist (contracted)
experience.description: Supported Channel, Enterprise and Mid-Market Sales Teams with all sales processes. Collaborated with Sales and Marketing to optimize and accelerate market-qualified opportunities. Lead disposition and tracking, including forecasting and revenue capture for opportunities. Performed lead re-qualification and prospect re-engagement to capitalize on opportunities delivered by marketing vendors. Collaborated with sales to develop territory strategy.

experience.title: Marketing Specialist
experience.description: Microsoft Team Lead - Lead caller and liaison between Microsoft Client Success Associate and team of 23 Calling Agents. Coordinated and led all meetings to discuss results of campaign analysis with Internal Client Success members and Key Microsoft Stakeholders. Conducted all training and coaching of Agents prior to Microsoft Certification Campaign. Campaign Tester - Testing the validity of data, messaging and targeted contacts prior to a campaign going live. Troubleshoot campaigns not meeting expected KPIs, providing feedback and recommendations. Dell SonicWALL Chat Specialist - Supported existing and potential Dell SonicWALL customers. Event Recruitment, Appointment Setting, Lead Generation - Invited targeted key contacts based on client objectives to marketing events and scheduled firm date/time meetings with key contacts.
